# useIsSpeaking

The `useIsSpeaking` hook returns a `boolean` that indicates if the participant is speaking or not.

## Import

```typescript
import { useIsSpeaking } from "@livekit/components-react";
```

## Usage

```tsx
const isSpeaking = useIsSpeaking(participant);
```

```typescript
boolean;
```
